abstract.p: Israeli Army kills three Palestinian militants trying to plant explosives near border fence in Gaza (S)

block.p: The Israeli Army shot four Palestinian militants who were trying to plant explosives near the border fence in Gaza on Saturday morning, killing three and seriously wounding one, an Army spokeswoman said. A spokesman for the military wing of Hamas said they were members of the Hamas Izzedine al-Qassam Brigades on a ''jihad mission.''

The violence on Saturday occurred shortly after the Palestinian president, Mahmoud Abbas, of Fatah, and Khaled Meshal, the exiled leader of Hamas, met in Cairo to try to reinforce a tenuous five-month-old cease-fire and to call on the international community to lift its economic embargo of the Palestinian government.
